name: Investar Holding Corporation
description: Investar Holding Corporation is a financial services company based in the United States, primarily engaged in commercial banking through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Investar Bank. Founded in 2006, the bank provides a wide range of financial products and services to both individual and corporate clients, including commercial and residential loans, deposit accounts, and treasury management services. Investar Bank emphasizes community-focused banking, aiming to build lasting relationships with its customers and support local economic growth. The bank operates several branches across Louisiana, demonstrating a strong commitment to the communities it serves. Investar Holding Corporation has adopted a growth-oriented strategy, focusing on expanding its footprint through organic growth as well as strategic acquisitions. With a mission to provide exceptional service and innovative banking solutions, Investar is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of its clients while maintaining a strong capital position and financial stability.

seo.meta_description: Explore Investar Holding Corporation, a community-focused financial services company dedicated to providing innovative banking solutions and exceptional service.

faq.question: What services does Investar Bank offer?
faq.answer: Investar Bank offers commercial and residential loans, deposit accounts, and treasury management services.

faq.question: Where is Investar Holding Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Investar Holding Corporation is headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA.
